description: Fantastical images of animals (primarily elephants), figures and machines on winding elevated paths; primarily reddish-pink ground; collage, drawn and painted elements; machine (printing press?), LRC; people painting, LLC; central greenish tower with cat; architectural elements; some ink stamped elements
marks: LRC, in black: DORMAN \'14. On back, in black: Josh
medium: Ink, acrylic and collaged antique paper on canvas mounted to board
title: Red Roil
